locations.name: The Forum
locations.description: Main public square, surrounded by temples and government buildings
locations.time_of_day: Morning busiest, quieter in afternoon heat
locations.historical_notes: Center of public life, where citizens conducted business and politics

locations.name: Thermopolium of Vetutius Placidus
locations.description: Roman fast-food counter serving hot food and wine
locations.time_of_day: Busy at all hours, peak during meal times
locations.historical_notes: One of many thermopolia serving those without kitchen facilities

locations.name: Stabian Baths
locations.description: Public baths with hot, warm, and cold rooms
locations.time_of_day: Afternoon most popular, open to all citizens
locations.historical_notes: Separate hours for men and women, social center of Roman life

locations.name: House of the Faun
locations.description: Luxurious private residence of wealthy patrician family
locations.time_of_day: Morning business, afternoon leisure, evening banquets
locations.historical_notes: Largest house in Pompeii, showing extreme wealth and Hellenistic influence

locations.name: Pompeii Amphitheater
locations.description: Outdoor arena for gladiatorial games and spectacles
locations.time_of_day: Games held during daylight hours, especially holidays
locations.historical_notes: Oldest surviving Roman amphitheater, capacity 20,000 spectators
